chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Henre Haslin, p. 21—Former Master of the Sword for the Queen's Guards in Caemlyn. He was too old for campaigning, so Gaebril handed him his pension and showed him the gate to get him out of the way. When news of Morgase's death, he started drinking. He believes that Gaebril killed her, and is willing to teach Rand's students at the Black Tower. He also instructed Galad and Gawyn in the sword, and taught them the Oneness.
